name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Bernard C. JERRY, Appellant

ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Judgments of sentence affirmed.

casebody.head_matter:
441 A.2d 1210
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Bernard C. JERRY, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Oct. 3, 1980.
Decided March 10, 1982.
Bernard C. Jerry, in pro per.
John Lee Brown, Jr., Asst. Dist. Atty., Beaver, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J, and NIX, KAUFFMAN, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and ROBERTS, JJ.
